prologue:
The village by the forest received
a letter from the demon king of the forest.

I want to eat a burger that tastes
so good that I won’t crave for any other food.

Bring me a burger that will
satisfy me in three days,or else
I will devour the entire village!

The villagers began to panic about
how to make a burger that
will satisfy the demon king.

They all gathered and brainstormed
plans at 3 AM and finally
decided to hold a three day

burger competition to craft
the most delicious burger
for the demon king…
